statements: SELECT * FROM dancers;
SELECT dancer_name, next_of_kin_name FROM dancers ORDER BY dancer_name DESC;
SELECT dancer_id, next_of_kin_name, next_of_kin_contact FROM dancers WHERE next_of_kin_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dancer_name, next_of_kin_name, medical_conditions FROM dancers WHERE medical_conditions LIKE '%allergy%';
SELECT dancer_id, dancer_name, next_of_kin_contact FROM dancers WHERE next_of_kin_contact LIKE '555%';
SELECT dancer_name, medical_conditions, allergies FROM dancers WHERE dancer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM dancers WHERE next_of_kin_name IS NOT NULL AND next_of_kin_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dancer_id, dancer_name FROM dancers ORDER BY dancer_name ASC;
SELECT dancer_name, next_of_kin_name, next_of_kin_contact FROM dancers WHERE medical_conditions LIKE '%asthma%';
SELECT * FROM dancers WHERE next_of_kin_name = 'John Smith' AND next_of_kin_contact = '555-1234';
SELECT * FROM DancerContacts WHERE dancer_id = 1;
SELECT dancer_name, next_of_kin_name FROM DancerContacts WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dancer_name, next_of_kin_contact FROM DancerContacts ORDER BY dancer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DanceGroup WHERE group_name LIKE 'Ballet%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_groups FROM DanceGroup;
SELECT dancer_id, dancer_name, next_of_kin_name FROM DancerContacts WHERE dancer_name='Alice';
SELECT dancer_name, medical_conditions, allergies FROM DancerContacts WHERE medical_conditions LIKE '%diabetes%' OR medical_conditions LIKE '%asthma%';
SELECT * FROM DancerContacts WHERE next_of_kin_contact LIKE '123%';
SELECT d.dancer_name, g.group_name FROM DancerContacts d JOIN DanceGroup g ON d.dancer_id = g.group_id;
SELECT dancer_name, next_of_kin_name, next_of_kin_contact FROM DancerContacts WHERE dancer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY dancer_name DESC, next_of_kin_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DancerEmergencyContacts;
SELECT next_of_kin_name, next_of_kin_phone FROM DancerEmergencyContacts;
SELECT medical_conditions FROM DancerEmergencyContacts WHERE dancer_id = 1;
SELECT dancer_id, next_of_kin_name, allergies FROM DancerEmergencyContacts ORDER BY dancer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM NextOfKinContacts WHERE dancer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM DancerEmergencyContacts;
SELECT dancer_id, next_of_kin_name FROM DancerEmergencyContacts ORDER BY dancer_id DESC;
SELECT next_of_kin_name, next_of_kin_phone FROM DancerEmergencyContacts WHERE dancer_id = 3;
SELECT name, phone, email FROM NextOfKinContacts WHERE dancer_id = 2;
SELECT medical_condition, allergy FROM MedicalConditionsAllergies WHERE dancer_id = 1 ORDER BY medical_condition_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Dancer;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM Dancer;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Dancer WHERE dancer_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM NextOfKin ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT dancer_id, condition_name, description FROM MedicalCondition WHERE dancer_id = '54321';
SELECT * FROM Dancer;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Dancer WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM NextOfKin WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT full_name, relationship FROM NextOfKin JOIN Dancer ON NextOfKin.dancer_id = Dancer.dancer_id;
SELECT dancer_id, condition_name FROM MedicalCondition WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DancerName, DancerPhoneNumber FROM DancerInfo;
SELECT DancerName, EmergencyContactName, NextOfKinName FROM DancerInfo;
SELECT DancerName, EmergencyContactName, EmergencyContactPhoneNumber FROM DancerInfo ORDER BY DancerName;
SELECT DancerName, DancerEmail, MedicalConditions FROM DancerInfo WHERE DancerID = 1;
SELECT * FROM NextOfKin WHERE RelationshipToDancer = 'Parent';
SELECT * FROM DancerInfo;
SELECT DancerName, DancerPhoneNumber, EmergencyContactName FROM DancerInfo WHERE DancerID = 1;
SELECT DancerName, DancerEmail, EmergencyContactName FROM DancerInfo WHERE DancerEmail IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM NextOfKin JOIN DancerInfo ON NextOfKin.NextOfKinID = DancerInfo.DancerID;
SELECT DancerName, EmergencyContactName, EmergencyContactPhoneNumber FROM DancerInfo ORDER BY DancerName DESC;
